reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, not itchy for sensitive skin, and appreciate its quality and softness.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Love This Sweater!
items.body: I am in love with this sweater! It’s everything I hoped for and more. The color is exactly as shown in the pictures, and the fit is true to size. I love that it can be styled off the shoulder for a relaxed look or worn as a regular sweater. It’s thick, warm, and super cozy, perfect for the fall season. After trying it out, I couldn’t resist picking up two more in the green and wine colors. Both shades are beautiful and are perfect for the fall season. The quality is excellent, has a soft knit feel and best of all it is wrinkle free. This sweater is one of my go to pieces. Highly recommend if you're looking for something stylish, versatile, and snuggly for cooler weather. Read more
items.author: Meli R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cute!
items.body: Let me start by saying size up if you want this sweater to fit like model in the picture. I'm 5'7" and about 110 lbs. I usually wear a small, but I ordered the large and it fits perfect. It's oversized and the neck line hangs slightly off my shoulder, but I can also wear it on my shoulders. I was pleasantly surprised at how soft it is. Looking at the picture and how it looked in the packaging, I was sure it would be scratchy. My daughter and I are both very sensitive to textures, and we both had the same "wow" reaction when we first touched it. I ordered the apricot and it's a bit more tan than I expected. That's really my only complaint because I bought it to go with a gray skirt and now I'm not sure that it goes together. Read more
items.author: Suzanne Roberts

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, cute sweater
items.body: I don't always like sweaters bought online without being able to feel them. This sweater is pretty soft and it is very comfortable to wear and is good quality. The off shoulder look is so cute and sits comfortably on my shoulders. The size is true to size. I hang it to dry after washing and its shape stays nice. I get a lot of compliments whenever I wear it. Read more
items.author: Kayla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I would make this sweater your next buy
items.body: This sweater is perfect for fall! It’s soft, cozy, and lightweight but still warm. The fit is true to size and flattering, and the crew neck style makes it easy to dress up or down. I love how versatile it is — great with jeans, leggings, or a skirt. Definitely a staple piece I’ll be wearing all season! Read more
items.author: Natalia G.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not oversized
items.body: Not oversized at all. Fits like a typical sweater and I got a size bigger than usual. Read more
items.author: Jessica Valenzuela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater once you find the right size
items.body: I'm 6ft tall and lean. I'd originally ordered a medium based on the reviews and hoped it'd also be long enough in length. I received the medium and it was just ok. Sleeves barely long enough was very oversized in the bodice but long enough where I could tuck into pants so it wasn't so boxy. Idk why I did but I decided to order a large to see how that fit and I'm glad I did. The sleeves were longer as was the bodice and it didn't look nearly as boxy? I think the different sizes come from different places maybe?they were packaged differently. Both large sweaters I ordered (I exchanged the original medium color for a large after seeming that size fit better) were vacuum sealed in the manufacturer's packaging but the medium one was just in a regular plastic zip seal with a barcode (maybe I'd been sent one someone else returned?). At any rate, don't be afraid to size up especially if you're tall and skinny. These are my new favorite sweaters. They are thick and stylish. Read more
items.author: Melissa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving it, so soft.
items.body: Thanks to all the ladies who reviewed this sweater. I wouldn't have given it a try, if not for you. I'm aprox 5'4" and 170lbs. I ordered the XL to give it the extra slouchy feel and was glad I did. I found it to be very soft and not at all scratchy. The chunky crew collar just makes it more fun. I bought the solid white color. The best description of the color would be like a lovely winter white or light creamy white. A very warm tone, not at all stark white looking. The best part for me was the lovely light beige marl that runs through the whole sweater. This gave it much more depth and character than just a flat monotone color. I was skeptical but so glad I took a chance. Some reviews called it cheap looking, but i found it quite lux. Thrilled with this comfy, slouchy lightweight but warm, beautiful oversized sweater. If you are a freak for marled yarn colors like I am, you won't be disappointed. Read more
items.author: Redhead

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Burgundy & red colors are off
items.body: I had purchased this sweater before I'm white. I've been looking for a deep red burgundy sweater and thought I would give this one a try since I already knew I liked the style. I ordered both solid burgundy and solid red. Both colors are very inaccurate compared to stick photos in my opinion. Solid burgundy is more of a purple tone. I still like it, it's pretty, and I may still end up keeping it. It's just not exactly what I was looking for. The solid red ended up being very much a deep pink color. It's also pretty, but definitely not what I would consider true red. The sweaters are still nice, just be careful that the colors might not be what you're expecting. I have posted some pictures of these sweaters next to other items of mine for color comparison. Read more
items.author: Amazon_Shopoholic

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Solid Grey Brown, Solid Grey, Solid White, Solid Royal Blue, Solid Orange, Solid Grey Blue, Solid Light Grey, Solid Oatmeal, Solid Bean Green, Solid Khaki, Solid Brown, Solid Dark Blue, Solid Black, Solid Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
